pr_title: Moved tree decorators into their own package

timeline.message: Moved tree decorators into their own package

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		COMMENT @return the lists of features configured for each {@link net.minecraft.world.gen.GenerationStep.Feature feature generation step}, up to the highest step that has a configured feature.
          
          
            
            		COMMENT Returns the lists of features configured for each {@link net.minecraft.world.gen.GenerationStep.Feature feature generation step}, up to the highest step that has a configured feature.
timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -41,7 +41,7 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1959 net/minecraft/world/biome/Biome
 	METHOD method_30350 addFeature (ILjava/util/function/Supplier;)V
 		ARG 1 stepIndex
 	METHOD method_30357 getFeatures ()Ljava/util/List;
-		COMMENT @return The lists of features configured for each {@link net.minecraft.world.gen.GenerationStep.Feature feature generation step}, up to the highest step that has a configured feature.
+		COMMENT @return the lists of features configured for each {@link net.minecraft.world.gen.GenerationStep.Feature feature generation step}, up to the highest step that has a configured feature.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		COMMENT @return null if no structure could be found within the given search radius
          
          
            
            		COMMENT @return {@code null} if no structure could be found within the given search radius
timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -23,15 +23,15 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_2794 net/minecraft/world/gen/chunk/ChunkGenerator COMMENT

COMMENT New chunks will only be generated up to the {@link net.minecraft.world.chunk.ChunkStatus#STRUCTURE_STARTS} phase by this method. COMMENT - COMMENT @return null if no structure could be found within the given search radius. + COMMENT @return null if no structure could be found within the given search radius

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            			COMMENT Don't return structures that are already referenced by generated chunks (chunks past the STRUCTURE_STARTS stage).
          
          
            
            			COMMENT This is ignored for strongholds.
          
          
            
            			COMMENT whether only structures that are not referenced by generated chunks (chunks past the STRUCTURE_STARTS stage) are returned, excluding strongholds
timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -23,15 +23,15 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_2794 net/minecraft/world/gen/chunk/ChunkGenerator COMMENT

COMMENT New chunks will only be generated up to the {@link net.minecraft.world.chunk.ChunkStatus#STRUCTURE_STARTS} phase by this method. COMMENT - COMMENT @return null if no structure could be found within the given search radius. + COMMENT @return null if no structure could be found within the given search radius ARG 1 world ARG 2 feature ARG 3 center ARG 4 radius COMMENT The search radius in chunks around the chunk the given block position is in. A radius of 0 will only search in the given chunk. COMMENT This is ignored for strongholds. ARG 5 skipExistingChunks - COMMENT Don't return structures that are aleady referenced by generated chunks (chunks past the STRUCTURE_STARTS stage). + COMMENT Don't return structures that are already referenced by generated chunks (chunks past the STRUCTURE_STARTS stage). COMMENT This is ignored for strongholds.

COMMENT New chunks will only be generated up to the {@link net.minecraft.world.chunk.ChunkStatus#STRUCTURE_STARTS} phase by this method.
